description: List all the messages in a channel. Returns a paginated list of ChannelMessages. By default, sorted by creation timestamp in descending order.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

parameters.name: SubChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the request.

nested_items.name: ChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the channel containing the requested messages.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token passed by previous API calls until all requested messages are returned.

nested_items.name: ChannelMessages
nested_items.description: The information about, and content of, each requested message.

nested_items.name: MessageId
nested_items.description: The ID of the message.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the channel message. For Amazon Lex V2 bot responses, this field holds a list of messages originating from the bot. For more information, refer to Processing responses from an AppInstanceBot in the Amazon Chime SDK Messaging Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Metadata
nested_items.description: The metadata of the message.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of message.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the message summary was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a message was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastEditedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a message was last edited.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN in an Identity.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name in an Identity.

nested_items.name: Redacted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a message was redacted.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The message status value.

nested_items.name: Detail
nested_items.description: Contains more details about the message status.

nested_items.name: MessageAttributes
nested_items.description: The attributes for the channel message. For Amazon Lex V2 bot responses, the attributes are mapped to specific fields from the bot. For more information, refer to Processing responses from an AppInstanceBot in the Amazon Chime SDK Messaging Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: StringValues
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: StringValues
nested_items.description: The strings in a message attribute value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: The content type of the channel message listed in the summary. For Amazon Lex V2 bot responses, the content type is application/amz-chime-lex-msgs for success responses and application/amz-chime-lex-error for failure responses. For more information, refer to Processing responses from an AppInstanceBot in the Amazon Chime SDK Messaging Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The target of a message, a sender, a user, or a bot. Only the target and the sender can view targeted messages. Only users who can see targeted messages can take actions on them. However, administrators can delete targeted messages that they can't see.

nested_items.name: MemberArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target channel member.

nested_items.name: SubChannelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the response.
